name: Verdammnis
description:
After the Moddb staff deleted my stuff from their page i thought to myself i don't want to let my project die and i'm back again.

This is the latest version of Verdammnis and it compatible with most doom mods, Verdammis pk3 contains all you need Music and Maps. 

There is a mod called verdammnis to go or short V-T-G this mod will be released soon too in his latest version V7.0

Instructions :

For playing verdammnis all you need is a original Copy of Doom II or a free version of Freedoom.

Also i recommend the GZDoom Source Port V.4.7

Links:

GZDoom : GzDoom

FreeDoom : Freedoom

Music Made in the Frist 5 Levels by Audio Insurgency
https://soundcloud.com/audioinsurgency
